original_text: The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees had spoken to the people about Jesus. They had told them, ‘If anyone knows where Jesus is, you must tell us.’ So then they could take hold of him to put him in a prison.
korean_text: 이는 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 누구든지 예수 있는 곳을 알거든 신고하여 잡게 하라 명령하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees
had spoken to the people about Jesus
If anyone knows where Jesus is
So then they could take hold of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 그를 붙잡을 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: to put him in a prison
